mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, username, password, `timestamp`) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())

INSERT INTO location (latitude, longitude, speed, heading, user_id, `timestamp`) VALUES (#{locationDto.latitude}, #{locationDto.longitude}, #{locationDto.speed}, #{locationDto.heading}, #{locationDto.userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())

INSERT INTO activity (type, confidence, user_id, location_id, `timestamp`) VALUES (#{activityDto.type}, #{activityDto.confidence}, #{activityDto.userId}, #{activityDto.locationId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
